metadata.title: Mocsicka Llama Happy Birthday Backdrop oh La Llama Cactus Theme Birthday Background A Whole Llama Fun Birthday Party Cake Table Decoration Photo Booth Props (7x5ft)
features: ❤【SIZE】7x5ft/210cm Wide x 150cm High. If you want other sizes, please send us custom messages.
❤【MATERIAL】The backdrop is made of vinyl fabric. It is lightweight and durable, which is light enough for a stand or to hang on a wall, but sturdy enough where it won't rip.
❤【WHAT YOU GET】1 pc llama happy birthday backdrop without the pocket. Please note that the stands and clips are not included.

❤【WIDELY USED】This backdrop is perfectly used as girls birthday party decorations or cake table banner or photo studio photography or wall decor or video decorations. It’ll definitely be a hit for your special event!

❤【REMOVE WRINKLES】Fabric backdrops will be sent folded for easy transporting. It had few wrinkles when it arrived. Please iron the back of the backdrop(not the image side) with steam iron. Iron it with low heat, then it will be smooth again.
description: Mocsicka Llama Happy Birthday Backdrop oh La Llama Cactus Theme Birthday Background A Whole Llama Fun Birthday Party Cake Table Decoration Photo Booth Props✦

✦- Our backdrop is not only an excellent portrait background for people of all ages.- It is also well suited for a variety of events, such as baby shower, birthday, gender reveal, wedding, and other celebrations.- It also serves as a great background for selfie, facebook live-streaming, television, videos, online classes or other photographs.- We hope our backdrop could be a good choice for you and a huge hit for your event.✦
✦- Material: Vinyl fabric.- Pocket: No pole pocket.- Package: Only one backdrop is included(stand is not included).✦
✦- Professional digital computer-printed. It makes the pattern more real and colorful.- Vinyl is durable. It is available indoors and outdoors. BUT do not use it in rainy or windy days.✦

✦1. The color shown on the screen may be a little different from the actual print due to the effect of the light or the computer moniter setting.2. Vinyl fabric is not washable. If there is a stain, take a damp cloth with little water to wipe clean.3. According to the policy of the post office, all backdrops will be sent in folded, so resulting creases. How to remove the creases:a. Eliminate creases by stretching all sides evenly ( usebackdrop stands, backdrop clips,clamps).b. Roll it up tightly with a cylinder, and waiting for 3-4 days. And the wrinkles are almost invisible.c.Please iron the back of the backdrop(not the image side) with steam iron but not dry iron. Iron it with low heat, then it will be smooth again.✦
✦If you want to customize the backdrop or want any other size, please feel free to contact us or directly email us with your detailed custom information!
